name: techpro media
tag_list: technology, information-technology, it, it-systems, it-software, it-tdm, developer, it-decision-maker, cloud, virtualization, crm, database, network-systems, servers, -net, php, mobile-development, java, ruby, agile-development, saas, paas, game-developer
overview:
TechPRO Media is an online advertising & demand generation firm specializing in IT/Tech. We operate a network of ten technology sites helping marketers reach B2B technology decision-makers. The company combines IT/Tech trade websites with ProAds, an audience targeting platform which enables marketers to target ads to specific categories, job titles or skillsets (eg IT Systems Professionals, Java Developers).

TechPRO Media is headquartered in San Francisco, CA. http://techpromedia.net
